title: SET_DISCORD_RICH_PRESENCE_ASSET_SMALL_TEXT
content:
0x35E62B6A// SetDiscordRichPresenceAssetSmallText
void SET_DISCORD_RICH_PRESENCE_ASSET_SMALL_TEXT(char* text);Parameters:text: Text to be displayed when hovering over small image asset. Note that you must also set a valid small image asset using the SET_DISCORD_RICH_PRESENCE_ASSET_SMALL native.This native sets the hover text of the small image asset for the discord rich presence implementation.
